ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Tests of goodness-of-fit based on a kernel smoothing of the data.
Tests of goodness-of-fit based on a kernel smoothing of the data.

name: r-gofkernel
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "2.1-3" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-gofkernel
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/GoFKernel_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/GoFKernel/GoFKernel_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: f9fcd289c8341fd4fa70f4ec71764a703b86512362612104b4ad1b4fb023c35b

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-kernsmooth
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-kernsmooth

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('GoFKernel')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('GoFKernel')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=GoFKernel
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Tests of goodness-of-fit based on a kernel smoothing of the data.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: GoFKernel
# Type: Package
# Title: Testing Goodness-of-Fit with the Kernel Density Estimator
# Version: 2.1-1
# Date: 2018-05-26
# Author: Jose M. Pavia
# Maintainer: Jose M. Pavia <Jose.M.Pavia@uv.es>
# Description: Tests of goodness-of-fit based on a kernel smoothing of the data.
# Depends: stats, KernSmooth
# License: GPL
# Packaged: 2018-05-26 20:09:05 UTC; Jose Manuel
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-05-26 22:01:54 UTC
